3. The person eating orange is between the person eating lettuce and the person who's hobby is collecting. Since the gardener and the person eating lettuce are already placed, the person eating orange (O) must be in the second column.

   |               |       P      |       O      |    L    |     ?    |
   | Food          |             |             |        |         |
   | Hobby         | Gardening   |             |        |         |
   | Movie-Genre   |             |             |        |         |

   |               |       P      |       O      |    L    |    C    |
   | Food          |             |             |        |         |

   | Movie-Genre   |             |             |        |         |

5. The person watching comedy movies is also on the far right. Since we already placed the comedy watcher in the fourth column, this condition is satisfied.

6. The person watching time-travel movies is the person who's hobby is gardening. Since we already know the gardener is the person eating pepper, the gardener must be watching time-travel movies (TT).

   |               |       P      |       O      |    L    |    C    |
